text: The Accused is a 1988 American crime drama movie. It is about a young woman who is gang raped in a bar. Jodie Foster plays Sarah Tobias. Kelly McGillis plays Kathryn Murphy. Foster won the Academy Award for Best Actress in 2018. This movie got positive reviews from critics. It made a lot of money. == References == Category:1988 crime drama movies Category:1980s legal movies Category:Academy Award winning movies Category:1980s American crime drama movies Category:American legal movies Category:1980s English-language movies Category:Movies based on real life events Category:Rape in movies
title: The Accused (1988 movie)
